summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Human Resources authorizing applications to and agreements with the Washington State Planning and Community Affairs Agency for financial assistance under Section 231 of the Economic Opportunity Act of 1964 as amended and the United States Community Services Administration for the operation of a training and technical assistance program, increasing expenditure allowances in the 1981 Budget of the Department and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Human Resources Operating Fund.
